description: Missing calls to `_audit_logger.log_event` in LLM decision path. Logic review shows 0 matches for log_event in file, violating compliance requirements.
Synchronous `setState` call within `useEffect` causes cascading renders. ESLint validation error: 'Calling setState synchronously within an effect can trigger cascading renders'.
Multiple code quality issues (unused arguments, unsorted imports, trailing whitespace) detected by Ruff.
